unstructured_field_rules.text: Note: We have to create a master data (EDV) for getting below information based on the outlet code. Master data (EDV) format needs to be shared by UB team.
Outlet Code Entry:  The SPOC enters the Outlet Code, which is validated by the Manch system against the code associated with the generated link.
Upon accessing the link, the SPOC is prompted to agree to the data privacy policy and terms of conditions (Change beneficiary -same TOC (outlet kyc).
Note: Details will change based on the answer given by SPOC and validated by MANCH with the system data.
Assignment to Approver: Once all the mandatory fields are entered, validated, and the request is submitted, the system automatically assigns the request to the appropriate approver.
The approver clicks the link to access all request details and can either approve or reject the request based on the provided information.
Respond to mandatory question: TSE answers the mandatory question: "Are you approving this request?" by selecting either "Yes" or "No" from the dropdown menu.
If TSE clicks "Reject," they select a rejection reason from a dropdown and submit it. The request returns to the SPOC for necessary modifications.
If ASM clicks "Reject," they select a rejection reason from a dropdown (configured based on UB rejection reasons) and submit it. The request returns to the SPOC for necessary modifications
If UB approver clicks "Reject," they select a rejection reason from a dropdown (configured based on UB rejection reasons) and submit it. The request returns to the SPOC for necessary modifications.
